H0.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Led Zeppelin

H1.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Aerosmith

H2.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. The Rolling Stones

H3.text: Which band released the albums Sheer Heart Attack and A Day at the Races. Quene

A4.text: Queen first charted in the UK with their second album, Queen II, in 1974. Sheer Heart Attack later that year and A Night at the Opera in 1975 brought them international success.

A5.text: By 1976, Queen were back in the studio recording A Day at the Races, which is often regarded as a sequel album to A Night at the Opera.

A6.text: Sheer Heart Attack is the third studio album by the British rock band Queen

A7.text: Sheer Heart Attack was released on 8 November 1974 by EMI Records in the United Kingdom and by Elektra Records in the United States
